## Contact Information
Felix-Antoine Carignan, PSPC/SPAC (he/him) - felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of services for Heat Pump Upgrades to meet current halocarbon regulations. The services involve replacing gas R-22 with a compliant refrigerant and changing necessary parts for conversion, along with rapid after-sales maintenance services for the warranty period. The locations are in Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada. For more details, please refer to Annex A.
